title: Acclamator-class Assault Ship
wikitext:
[[File:acclamator1.jpg|500px|thumb|right]] '''Acclamator Assault Ship'''
'''Craft''': Rothana Heavy Engineering ''Acclamator''-class Military Transport
'''Affiliation''': Old Republic / Empire
'''Era''': Rise of the Empire
'''Source''': d20 Core Rulebook (page 234)
'''Type''': Assault ship

'''Space''': 6
'''Atmosphere''': 330; 950 kmh
